actions.text: On agreeing to the Rigell amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 248 (Roll no. 225).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rigell amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 248 (Roll no. 225).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Rigell.

description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to modify the temporary suspension of public-private competitions for conversion of Department of Defense functions to contractor performance and permit the Secretary of Defense to exempt existing public-private partnerships from the OMB Budget Circular A-76 process.
purpose: Amendment sought to modify the temporary suspension of public-private competitions for conversion of Department of Defense functions to contractor performance and permit the Secretary of Defense to exempt existing public-private partnerships from the OMB Budget Circular A-76 process.
